thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: Connie Thompson Jr
thread.title_full: Sportsmemorabilia reviewed by Connie Thompson Jr

author: Connie Thompson Jr
title: Connie Thompson Jr
text: I purchased two NFL mini helmet display cases with my order. One was not the product I selected and the return process began. I had the great pleasure of speaking with Genevieve Busby with the assistance of Jodi-Ann Laureano. Both were phenomenal and provided top notch service from the beginning to the end. I remain impressed with these two along with Sports Memorabilia because they stay true to their customers. I routinely received updates on the return status along with notifications on my corrected shipment package. I highly recommend Sports Memorabilia because of great representatives like Genevieve and Joe-Ann and also great products!
